titleInfo.title: Detection of NH (X3 [Sigma]-) by resonance fluorescence in the pulsed vacuum UV photolysis of NH3 and its application to reactions of NH radicals

mods.abstract: Using resonance fluorescence the kinetics of NH (X3 [Sigma]-) was studied in the pulsed vacuum UV photolysis of mixtures of NH3 and NO. The rate constant of the reaction NH + NO was determined to be (4.7 = 1.2) x lO - 11 cm 3 molecule - 1 s - 1

bibliographicCitation.apa: Hansen, I., Kohse-Höinghaus, K., Zetzsch, C., & Stuhl, F. (1976). Detection of NH (X3 [Sigma]-) by resonance fluorescence in the pulsed vacuum UV photolysis of NH3 and its application to reactions of NH radicals. Chemical Physics Letters, 42(2), 370-372. https://doi.org/10.1016/0009-2614(76)80387-9
